Package fast3d.simple

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FrameRate
    a class used by SimplePanel3d to acquire constant over time repaint() calls
    repaints the JComponent given to the constructor ongoing in specified intervals
    SimplePanel3d
    a default implementation of Panel3d with various features to simplify coding
    it is highly recommended from subclasses to call super on preRender() and render()
    SimpleUniverse
    a default implementation of universe
    TurtlePanel3d
    a Panel3d using Turtle3d-graphics to render a scenery
    render(Turtle3d) is called after rendering the universe as usual
